verses.verse: Furthermore <WG3063> then<WG3767> we beseech<WG2065> you,<WG5209> brethren,<WG80> and<WG2532> exhort<WG3870> you by<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> that as<WG2531> ye have received<WG3880> of<WG3844> us<WG2257> how<WG4459> ye<WG5209> ought<WG1163> to walk<WG4043> and<WG2532> to please<WG700> God,<WG2316> so ye would<WG2443> abound<WG4052> more and more.<WG3123>
For <WG1063> ye know<WG1492> what<WG5101> commandments<WG3852> we gave<WG1325> you<WG5213> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus.<WG2424>
For <WG1063> this<WG5124> is<WG2076> the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> even your<WG5216> sanctification,<WG38> that ye<WG5209> should abstain<WG567> from<WG575> fornication: <WG4202>
That every one<WG1538> of you<WG5216> should know<WG1492> how to possess<WG2932> his<WG1438> vessel<WG4632> in<WG1722> sanctification<WG38> and<WG2532> honor;<WG5092>
Not <WG3361> in<WG1722> the lust<WG3806> of concupiscence,<WG1939> even<WG2532> as<WG2509> the<WG3588> Gentiles<WG1484> which know<WG1492> not<WG3361> God: <WG2316>

That no<WG3361> man go beyond<WG5233> and<WG2532> defraud<WG4122> his<WG848> brother<WG80> in<WG1722> any matter:<WG4229> because that<WG1360> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> is the avenger<WG1558> of<WG4012> all<WG3956> such,<WG5130> as<WG2531> we also<WG2532> have forewarned<WG4277> you<WG5213> and<WG2532> testified.<WG1263>
For <WG1063> God<WG2316> hath not<WG3756> called<WG2564> us<WG2248> unto<WG1909> uncleanness,<WG167> but<WG235> unto<WG1722> holiness.<WG38>

He therefore that despiseth,<WG114> <WG5105> despiseth<WG114> not<WG3756> man,<WG444> but<WG235> God,<WG2316> who hath also given<WG1325> <WG2532> unto<WG1519> us<WG2248> his<WG848> Holy<WG40> Spirit.<WG4151>

But <WG1161> as touching<WG4012> brotherly love<WG5360> ye need<WG2192> <WG5532> not<WG3756> that I write<WG1125> unto you:<WG5213> for<WG1063> ye<WG5210> yourselves<WG846> are<WG2075> taught of God<WG2312> to<WG1519> love<WG25> one another.<WG240>

And <WG1063> indeed<WG2532> ye do<WG4160> it<WG846> toward<WG1519> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> brethren<WG80> which<WG3588> are in<WG1722> all<WG3650> Macedonia:<WG3109> but<WG1161> we beseech<WG3870> you,<WG5209> brethren,<WG80> that ye increase<WG4052> more and more;<WG3123>

And <WG2532> that ye study<WG5389> to be quiet,<WG2270> and<WG2532> to do your own business,<WG4238> <WG2398> and<WG2532> to work<WG2038> with your<WG5216> own<WG2398> hands,<WG5495> as<WG2531> we commanded<WG3853> you;<WG5213>
That <WG2443> ye may walk<WG4043> honestly<WG2156> toward<WG4314> them that are without,<WG1854> and<WG2532> that ye may have<WG2192> lack<WG5532> of nothing.<WG3367>

But <WG1161> I would<WG2309> not<WG3756> have you<WG5209> to be ignorant,<WG50> brethren,<WG80> concerning<WG4012> them which are asleep,<WG2837> that<WG2443> ye sorrow<WG3076> not,<WG3361> even<WG2532> as<WG2531> others<WG3062> which have<WG2192> no<WG3361> hope.<WG1680>

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> we believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> died<WG599> and<WG2532> rose again,<WG450> even so<WG3779> them also which sleep<WG2837> <WG2532> in<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> will God<WG2316> bring<WG71> with<WG4862> him.<WG846>

For <WG1063> this<WG5124> we say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213> by<WG1722> the word<WG3056> of the Lord,<WG2962> that<WG3754> we<WG2249> which are alive<WG2198> and remain<WG4035> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> coming<WG3952> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> shall not<WG3364> prevent<WG5348> them which are asleep.<WG2837>

For <WG3754> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> himself<WG846> shall descend<WG2597> from<WG575> heaven<WG3772> with<WG1722> a shout,<WG2752> with<WG1722> the voice<WG5456> of the archangel,<WG743> and<WG2532> with<WG1722> the trump<WG4536> of God:<WG2316> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> dead<WG3498> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> shall rise<WG450> first: <WG4412>

Then <WG1899> we<WG2249> which are alive<WG2198> and remain<WG4035> shall be caught up<WG726> together<WG260> with<WG4862> them<WG846> in<WG1722> the clouds<WG3507> to meet<WG1519> <WG529> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> in<WG1519> the air:<WG109> and<WG2532> so<WG3779> shall we ever<WG3842> be<WG2071> with<WG4862> the Lord.<WG2962>
Wherefore <WG5620> comfort<WG3870> one another<WG240> with<WG1722> these<WG5125> words.<WG3056>
